Our Story
Owners Gerry and Tammy Haight know the importance and value of using only the best ingredients. It makes a difference, and guests know it. That's why Vespa Pizzeria was born from a vision to create an authentic Neapolitan-style pizza by incorporating traditional cooking methods and using only the freshest, highest quality ingredients. 
Stop In!

Daniel Island, SC

Welcome to Vespa Pizzeria

Owners Gerry and Tammy Haight know the importance and value of using only the best ingredients. It makes a difference, and guests know it. That’s why Vespa Pizzeria was born from a vision to create an authentic Neapolitan-style pizza by incorporating traditional cooking methods and using only the freshest, highest quality ingredients.
